definition: cheap showy jewelry or ornament on clothing
details:
noun
- cheap showy jewelry or ornament on clothing
= example: cheap showy jewelry or ornament on clothing
= synonyms: gaud
- a small inexpensive mass-produced article
= example: a small inexpensive mass-produced article
= synonyms: knickknack
- originality by virtue of being new and surprising
= example: originality by virtue of being new and surprising
= synonyms: freshness
